name: neoDefense
description:
DEFEND YOUR SPROUT OF NEW LIFE FROM INVADER!

neoDefense is a defense game set in a core of new life invaded by countless creeps.

Build your fortress any way you wish, upgrade weapons and let the invasions begin! And sweep them!

This game need your brilliant idea to defeat enemies attack!


[FEATURES]

• Build your own fortress for incoming waves of enemies!
• More than 500 waves of creeps across 45 missions (And will be added more later!)
• 4 upgradable weapons to kill the creeps with style (And will be added more later!)
• There is a BOSS at the end of each group of missions (It's too hard to defeat!)
• Amazing soundtrack in each group of missions


[IN-APP PURCHASES]

Each in-app purchase can make you challenge more missions from Gamma sector.



[SUPPORT AND FEEDBACK]

Please contact duetblock@duetblock.com with any inquiry or feedback.

You can find the latest development updates and news on Youtube, Facebook and Twitter.
Please visit www.duetBlock.com for more detail.
